advertisements.title: The Municipality of Titay Reigns Supreme!
advertisements.description:
The Municipality of Titay proudly emerged as the Champion in the Intermunicipality Statistical Exhibit Competition 2025, marking yet another remarkable achievement for our beloved town. This victory is a reflection of the unity, creativity, and dedication of the people behind the exhibit, and most importantly, of the unwavering leadership that continues to inspire excellence in all aspects of governance.
At the heart of this success is our ever-dedicated and visionary leader, Hon. Mayor DONRIO Martinez, whose steadfast support and genuine passion for progress have always propelled Titay toward greater heights. Her commitment to empowering every office to excel, her belief in the power of innovation and data-driven development, and her constant encouragement to â€œserve with heartâ€ have been the driving forces behind this triumph. Through her guidance, the team was motivated to go beyond expectations, turning ideas into impactful outcomes that truly reflect the spirit and strength of Titay.
This accomplishment also stands as a proud moment for the Office of the Municipal Civil Registrar (OMCR), ably led by Maâ€™am Jonalyn Yamaro. Titayâ€™s outstanding exhibit stood out as a testament to the municipalityâ€™s commitment to good governance and statistical excellence.
Once again, congratulations to the Municipality of Titay for bringing home the championship title! This victory is a shining reminder that with dedicated leadership, teamwork, and heart, Titay will always rise and reign supreme. ğŸ’™âœ¨

advertisements.title: TITAY PRIDE!
advertisements.description:
The Municipality of Titay proudly stands among the Recipients of the Most Outstanding Local Youth Development Office â€“ Component Cities and Municipalities Category! 
Congratulations to our dedicated Local Youth Development Officer, Mr. Mart Greggy Aying, for his steadfast service, innovative programs, and genuine commitment to uplifting the youth sector. His passion continues to inspire collaboration, creativity, and leadership among young Titayanons. 
Under the strong and compassionate leadership of Mayor DONRIO Martinez-Castillo, the Municipal Government of Titay remains steadfast in supporting and recognizing the efforts, dreams, and movements of our youth because in their hands lies the promise of a brighter tomorrow.

newsArticles.title: ACCOMPLISHMENT ON ANTI-ILLEGAL DRUGS
BFP | ğˆğğ•ğ„ğğ“ğğ‘ğ˜ ğğ… ğğ„ğ‘ğ’ğğğğ„ğ‹, ğğ‘ğğğ„ğ‘ğ“ğ˜ ğ€ğğƒ ğ„ğğ”ğˆğğŒğ„ğğ“ ğŸğŸğŸğŸ“
newsArticles.summary:
The Bureau of Fire Protection (BFP)  Annual Inventory Team 2025, composed of Commissioned and Non-Commissioned Officers from the BFP Regional Office IX in coordination with Representatives from the Commission on Audit, conducted a comprehensive inventory of personnel, property, and equipment at Titay Municipal Fire Station, Poblacion Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.
The annual inventory of personnel, property, and equipment in the Bureau of Fire Protection (BFP) Region IX ensures accountability and compliance with Commission on Audit (COA) guidelines. It verifies the proper recording, condition, and completeness of government-issued assets, including uniforms and equipment, while identifying shortages or damages for timely action. This process promotes transparency, efficiency, and operational readiness across the organization

newsArticles.title: ANNOUNCEMENT
newsArticles.summary:
ğŸ“¢ ANNOUNCEMENT
ACCEPTING FOLDERS FOR ATTRITION QUOTA (PNP RECRUITMENT)
The Titay Municipal Police Station is now accepting application folders for the PNP Attrition Quota Recruitment Program.
ğŸ“Œ IMPORTANT REMINDER:
All submitted documents must be photocopies taken from the original folders submitted to the Regional Office. Incomplete or improperly labeled folders will not be accepted.
ğŸ“ REQUIREMENTS
1. Personal Data and Eligibility Documents
Duly accomplished CSC Personal Data Sheet (Revised 2005)
Certificate of Eligibility / Civil Service Eligibility / Other Required Eligibility / License / Professional License (authenticated copy)
Birth Certificate (PSA/NSO authenticated)
Transcript of Records and Diploma (authenticated copies)
2. Clearances / Local Documents
Barangay Clearance
Police Clearance
NBI Clearance
Mayorâ€™s Clearance
Prosecutor / Fiscal Clearance
RTC / MTC / Municipal Trial Court Clearance
3. Photos / ID Pictures
Two (2) pcs. colored 2Ã—2 ID pictures (white background)
One (1) bust-size picture (wearing white V-neck shirt)
One (1) whole-body picture (wearing white V-neck shirt, maong pants, and white rubber shoes)
4. Good Moral Character & Declarations
Certificate of Good Moral Character (issued by school or college)
5. Valid Identifications
Two (2) valid IDs with specimen signatures
6. Other Documents (if applicable)
Height Waiver and/or Age Waiver (if qualified)
Screenshot or printout of Facebook postings
ğŸ“ NOTE:
All required documents must be compiled in a properly labeled folder and personally submitted to Titay MPS between October 17 and 22, 2025. The schedule of the interview will be announced at a later date.
For further inquiries, please coordinate with the Administrative Section, Titay Municipal Police Station.

newsArticles.title: TITAY MPS JOINS AD HOC COMMITTEE INTERVIEW FOR PNP ASPIRANTS
newsArticles.summary:
TITAY MPS JOINS AD HOC COMMITTEE INTERVIEW FOR PNP ASPIRANTS
LOOK | PMAJ ARNOLD A. ESPARES, Acting Chief of Police, participated in the Ad Hoc Screening and Interview for PNP Aspirants held at the ABC Session Hall, ABC Building, Poblacion, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay, on October 23, 2025.
The screening panel was composed of Atty. Renato Martinez, Chairman/Representative of the Municipal Mayor;  Mrs. Angelita C. Narciso, MLGOO; Hon. Princess Lerah B. Talania, Peace and Order Council Member; Ms. Marlene B. Sehob, NGO Woman Representative; and PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, Acting Chief of Police.
The activity aims to ensure that only qualified and deserving applicants are selected to serve in the Philippine National Police, thereby promoting integrity, transparency, and professionalism in the recruitment process.
This initiative underscores the strong partnership between the Local Government Unit (LGU) and the Titay Municipal Police Station (MPS) in their shared commitment to uphold peace, order, and public safety within the community.

newsArticles.title: TITAY MPS Heightens Security Measures for UNDAS 2025
newsArticles.summary:
TITAY MPS Heightens Security Measures for UNDAS 2025
At around 10:00 AM of October 30, 2025, PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, Chief of Police, personally inspected different cemeteries in Titay Municipality, including residential areas and business establishments, to ensure the proper implementation of the security measures in the observance of All Saints' and All Souls' Days. PMAJ ESPARES, instructed all personnel deployed to maintain visible police presence and work closely with Local Government Unit and Barangay officials to prevent burglary and other crimes while families are away visiting their deceased loved ones. Also reminded the public to take extra precautions before leaving their homes and make sure that all doors and windows are locked. If there are any suspicious activity, report it immediately to Titay MPS or through our hotline number 0998-598-6747 and 0953-502-7422.

newsArticles.title: TITAY MPS CONTINUES SUCCESSFUL OPERATIONS AND SEIZURES OF ILLEGAL DRUGS
newsArticles.summary: TITAY MPS CONTINUES SUCCESSFUL OPERATIONS AND SEIZURES OF ILLEGAL DRUGS UNDER ITS "BLOODLESS AND RIGHTS-BASED" ANTI-DRUG CAMPAIGN. THE ARREST OF ONE MALE DRUG PERSONALITY, AND THE CAMPAIGN'S OVERALL EFFECTIVENESS IN COMBATING THE ILLICIT DRUG TRADE.

newsArticles.title: Andam na ang tibuok Kapulisan sa Titay
newsArticles.summary: Andam na ang tibuok Kapulisan sa Titay nga gipangulohan ni PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, ACOP, aron maghatag og siguridad og kahapsay sa pagsaulog sa Undas 2025.

newsArticles.title: UNDAS 2025 UPDATE | PNP ALERT
newsArticles.summary:
UNDAS 2025 UPDATE | PNP ALERT ğŸš”ğŸ’
Bisan daghan ang mga tawo sa mga sementeryo aron sa paghinumdom sa Undas, padayon gihapon ang atong kapulisan sa Titay MPS ubos sa pagdumala ni PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, ACOP sa pagpatuman sa balaod.
Dili babag ang okasyon sa pagsupak sa iligal nga droga ug sa pagdakop sa mga tawo nga padayon nga naglapas sa balaod.

newsArticles.title: UNDAS 2025 UPDATE | PNP ADVISORY!
newsArticles.summary:
UNDAS 2025 UPDATE | PNP ADVISORY!
Karon nga Nobyembre 1, 2025, samtang ang katawhan nagtimaan sa paghinumdom sa UNDAS ug nagduaw sa mga sementeryo aron sa paghatag-pugong ug pasidungog sa ilang mga minahal nga namatay, nagpabiling alerto ug aktibo ang Titay Municipal Police Station (MPS) ubos sa pagdumala sa ilang hepe nga si PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, sa pagpatuman sa mga balaod ug sa pagpanalipod sa katawhan.
Bisan pa sa kasagsagan sa kalihokan karong adlawa, padayon ang operasyon ug presensya sa kapulisan aron masiguro ang kahusay, kalinaw, ug seguridad sa tanan.
Ginaawhag ang tanan nga magpakita sa disiplina, kooperasyon, ug pagmatngon aron masiguro ang malinawon ug hapsay nga pag-obserba sa UNDAS 2025.

newsArticles.title: TITAY MPS NEWS
newsArticles.summary:
At about 11:50 AM of September 10, 2025, personnel of Titay Municipal Police Station led by PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, ACOP, facilitated the voluntary deposited of one (1) unrenewed firearm described as:
One (1) unit caliber .45mm Taurus (PT145 PRO â€“ Serviceable) Pistol, with Serial Number: NEP97981, with one (1) magazine loaded with five (5) rounds of live ammunition of same caliber that expired on March 28, 2023.
The said firearm was deposited by one male individual, married, driver by occupation, and a resident of Barangay Poblacion Muslim, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.
The said firearm is now under the custody of Titay MPS for proper disposition.

newsArticles.title: PNP | Campaign Against Illegal Drugs
newsArticles.summary:
At about 9:00 AM of September 11, 2025, PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, COP, Titay MPS together with BDCP PNCO of this station, attended the Municipal Anti-Drug Abuse Council (MADAC) and Municipal Peace and Order Council (MPOC) Meeting. During the meeting, PMAJ ESPARES presented the Operational Accomplishments of Titay MPS particularly on the Focus Directives such as the Campaign Against Illegal Drugs, Arrest of Wanted Persons, and Loose Firearms. PMAJ ESPARES tackled strategies and goals for improving public safety and to enhance quality service to the community. PMAJ ESPARES also aims to build and maintain public trust through integrity, professionalism, and a strong connection with the community to ensure a safer and drug-free community.
#SaBagongPilipinasAngGustongPulisLigtasKa
#ToServeandProtect

newsArticles.title: LDRRMO WEATHER UPDATES
newsArticles.summary:
As of 4:51PM of September 12, 2025, Titay MPS personnel under the leadership of PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, ACOP in coordination with the LDRRMO-Titay, closely monitor our weather condition, flood prone areas in relation to Preparedness Actions, and 
Precautionary Measures for Tropical Depression (TD)
â€œCRISINGâ€ and Southwest Monsoon (SWM)

newsArticles.title: PNP | ACCOMPLISHMENT ON ANTI-ILLEGAL DRUGS (Buy-bust) OPERATION:
newsArticles.summary:
ACCOMPLISHMENT ON ANTI-ILLEGAL DRUGS (Buy-bust) OPERATION:
At about 4:13 AM of September 9, 2025, MDET of Titay MPS led by PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, ACOP conducted drug Buy-bust operation at Barangay San Antonio, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay Province that resulted in the arrest of one male suspect and confiscation of the following items:
a. Five (5) pcs small heat-sealed transparent plastic sachets containing white crystalline substance suspected to be shabu with an estimated weight of 1 gram with SDP of Php 6,800.00; 
b. One (1) unit android mobile phone model Realme with cellphone case,color violet ( used as container )
c. One (1) pc Five-Hundred-peso bill (Marked Money) with serial number AE4241391.
Confiscated drug evidence was brought to Zamboanga Sibugay Provincial Forensic Unit for Qualitative and Quantitative examination, while the suspect was brought to Titay MPS for proper disposition and appropriate filing of case thru inquest proceeding.
